attributes.title: Lopez's Technical Guide to Empathy
attributes.caption: What does it mean to empathize? Join Red Team's resident robot in learning about the inner workings of the mind, feelings, and social interactions! Some assembly required.
attributes.description: What does it mean to empathize? Join Red Team's resident robot in learning about the inner workings of the mind, feelings, and social interactions! Some assembly required.

attributes.title: Unreal Estate
attributes.caption: Finding a new home can be a long and difficult process, but Sister and Grif have you covered! Simmons, however, has something to say about the change of scenery.
attributes.description: Finding a new home can be a long and difficult process, but Sister and Grif have you covered! Simmons, however, has something to say about the change of scenery.

attributes.title: A Trip Abroad
attributes.caption: Going on a trip abroad can be scary; luckily Grif and Simmons have some advice that will surely come in handy.
attributes.description: Going on a trip abroad can be scary; luckily Grif and Simmons have some advice that will surely come in handy.

attributes.title: Hard Truths
attributes.caption: Tough love is the only love you losers can hope for, am I right?
attributes.description: Tough love is the only love you losers can hope for, am I right?

attributes.title: RTX 2018
attributes.caption: August 3rd, 4th and 5th at the Austin Convention Center -- Be there, or be Blue!
attributes.description: August 3rd, 4th and 5th at the Austin Convention Center -- Be there, or be Blue!

attributes.title: Recycling
attributes.caption: Sarge and Grif are here to show you how to Reduce, Refuse, and Reload your Reliable shotgun! Also something about Recycling.
attributes.description: Sarge and Grif are here to show you how to Reduce, Refuse, and Reload your Reliable shotgun! Also something about Recycling.

attributes.title: Diversity
attributes.caption: Grif and Simmons attempt to discuss the importance of Diversity while simultaneously trying not to offend everyone.
attributes.description: Tired of all your soldiers being the same, cookie-cutter sort with no personality or distinguishable difference between them? Well then look no further than Blood Gulch where Men, Women, Robots, and Donut show us how having Diversity in your unit can lead to an almost functional co-existence.
